20 #ifndef _ROLES_H
21 #define _ROLES_H
22 
23 #define ROLE_READ_ALL 1 // roles are related to sanction permissions
24 #define ROLE_EXECUTE_ALL 2
25 #define ROLE_MOVE_ALL 4
26 #define ROLE_WRITE_ALL 8
27 #define ROLE_INSERT_ALL 16
28 #define ROLE_ANNOTATE_ALL 32
29 #define ROLE_SANCTION_ALL (1<<8)
30 #define ROLE_REBOOT (1<<16) // here are sanction-permission
31 #define ROLE_REGISTER_CLASSES (1<<17) // independent roles(at negative rights)
32 #define ROLE_GIVE_ROLES (1<<18)
33 #define ROLE_CHANGE_PWS (1<<19)
34 #define ROLE_REGISTER_MODULES (1<<20)
35 #define ROLE_CREATE_TOP_GROUPS (1<<21)
36 
37 #define ROLE_ALL_ROLES (1<<31)-1+(1<<30)
38 
39 #endif
